comment: I posted something that has attracted a lot of response , some of it very unpleasant . But I d like to make this clear ; I don t care . Brexiters have taken away my EU citizenship and , more importantly , that of my children . I take it personally , and will never stop fighting .

comment: % behind you all the way . I have no intention of joining hands with anyone who voted for Brexit or Tory . Anyone who voted for Brexit is either self serving or as thick as mince . Xenophobes the lot of them .

comment: Why bother , Chris ? If you were walking down the street and this loony was shouting this nonsense from a soapbox , would you stop and interact or just pretend you hadn't seen him and just count your blessings that fate didn't make you like him . All it takes is one knock on the head
